examples: Picking up toys from the floor
Grabbing a book from a shelf
variations.context: Common in most household settings without assistance.

variations.description: Using tools to assist in picking up objects.
examples: Using tongs to pick up small items
Using a gripper for hard-to-reach objects
variations.context: Used for objects that are hot, heavy, or difficult to grasp.

variations.description: Using robotic systems to pick up objects.
examples: Robotic vacuum picking up debris
Smart robot arm organizing objects
variations.context: Employed in smart homes or advanced automation.

variations.description: Picking up objects to adhere to cultural norms of tidiness.
examples: Cleaning up toys after playtime
Picking up clothes to avoid clutter
variations.context: Varies based on cultural expectations of cleanliness and order.

variations.description: Picking up objects as part of a ritual or tradition.
examples: Picking up ceremonial items during a prayer
Handling artifacts during cultural events
variations.context: Linked to specific cultural or religious practices.

variations.description: Picking up objects in outdoor settings.
examples: Picking up garden tools
Collecting trash during yard cleaning
variations.context: Common in gardening, picnics, or outdoor cleanup tasks.

examples: Picking up frozen items from a freezer
Handling tools in a cold garage
variations.context: Requires consideration of grip and material brittleness.

variations.description: Picking up objects in humid conditions where surfaces may be slippery.
examples: Handling wet towels in the bathroom
Picking up wet items from a laundry room
variations.context: Requires careful handling to avoid slips.

examples: Moving furniture
Picking up a large box
variations.context: Requires strength or assistance to avoid strain or injury.

variations.description: Picking up objects in a dusty or debris-filled environment.
examples: Cleaning up a dusty storage area
Picking up items in a workshop
variations.context: May require gloves or tools to avoid contact with dirt.
